item.title: A Two Dollar Piece of Cardboard
item.description: This week on Sunshine and Frank: Civilization: Beyond Earth is announced, Crytek has financial trouble, a former Valve contractor posts a pessimistic view of the coming VR trend; we discuss Valiant Hearts, the PC graphics arms race, augmented reality and driving, the decline of online gaming communites, and more.
